bug.author: lucazav
bug.description: In <denchmark-link:https://render.githubusercontent.com/view/ipynb?commit=7970209069b38265fa74b6cc15fa2693a457ecb1&enc_&nwo=lucazav%2FMachineLearningNotebooks&path=how-to-use-azureml%2Fmachine-learning-pipelines%2Fintro-to-pipelines%2Faml-pipelines-getting-started.ipynb&repository_id=259281926&repository_type=Repository#Creating-a-Step-in-a-Pipeline>this page</denchmark-link> about pipeline steps the <denchmark-link:https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/python/api/azureml-pipeline-steps/azureml.pipeline.steps.rscriptstep?view=azure-ml-py>RScriptStep</denchmark-link> is missing.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/lucazav>@lucazav</denchmark-link> we will review your feedback and get back to you shortly. Thanks.
As RScriptStep is in preview we are leaving it out of that notebook for now.
